body:
Translating Cap's responses to @CrystalVulpine

https://ruqqus.com/+uslashremoved/post/695h/sfrohne-permanently-banned-for-linking-to/lufl

>I'm going to have to ask you to stop harassing other users. Your zeal for freedom is admirable, but your conduct is crossing a line.

Translated: You are not allowed to criticize other users not being punished by us, despite the obvious double-standard. Those users have special privileges of admin protection which means their immune to all claims of unfair Terms of Service enforcement. Calling us out on our hypocrisy will result in a sitewide ban under the false reason of "harassment".


https://ruqqus.com/+uslashremoved/post/695h/sfrohne-permanently-banned-for-linking-to/luk2

>No, your crusade against users who are part of your fictional "cabal" is the problem. You have invented a conspiracy in your head, and are now lashing out at people for being part of that imagined conspiracy.

>I have reached out to you numerous times to explain everything you've ever questioned, yet you persist in harassing users with your dishonest interpretations of out-of-context screenshots. For example, did it not once occur to you that perhaps the Sfrohne screenshot was provided by an actual admin, and not a "secret" admin?

>I am not setting you up to be banned, I am giving you an opportunity to avoid getting banned. Your repeated attacks on people simply for being in the Ruqqus Discord server are unacceptable, and you are dancing on the edge of the "no targeted harassment" rule. You should stop now before you fall off.

Translated (in paragraph order):

The cabal is not real. There is no cabal. There is no RCP. It's all in your imagination. Everything you see is fake. Any screenshots of the cabal are fake. Any evidence is fake. (gaslighting 101)

It is a thought crime to publish evidence that goes against our narrative. We will protect those we have selectively chosen from all arguments against them. Criticism is not allowed on our fake free-speech platform. All criticism is considered harassment and now a crime.

>I am not setting you up to be banned, I am giving you an opportunity to avoid getting banned. 

(can we all just admire what a golden statement that is coming from the retard admins)

Attacking people for being in the Ruqqus Discord is not allowed. Stop criticizing us at once or you will be promptly banned. Also, any evidence of discord screenshots is fake if it's presented by the other side criticizing the RCP. Everything you do is your fault and never our fault for the unequal enforcement of the Ruqqus ToS.

Not to mention they already exiled @CrystalVulpine from +Ruqqus for valid criticism.

https://ruqqus.com/+general/post/69dy/captainmeta4-and-asinineporcupine-should-be-permabanned

https://ruqqus.com/+Ruqqus/mod/log/4o0

https://ruqqus.com/+Ruqqus/mod/log/4nz

Translating Cap's responses to @CrystalVulpine

https://ruqqus.com/+uslashremoved/post/695h/sfrohne-permanently-banned-for-linking-to/lufl

I'm going to have to ask you to stop harassing other users. Your zeal for freedom is admirable, but your conduct is crossing a line.

Translated: You are not allowed to criticize other users not being punished by us, despite the obvious double-standard. Those users have special privileges of admin protection which means their immune to all claims of unfair Terms of Service enforcement. Calling us out on our hypocrisy will result in a sitewide ban under the false reason of "harassment".

https://ruqqus.com/+uslashremoved/post/695h/sfrohne-permanently-banned-for-linking-to/luk2

No, your crusade against users who are part of your fictional "cabal" is the problem. You have invented a conspiracy in your head, and are now lashing out at people for being part of that imagined conspiracy.

I have reached out to you numerous times to explain everything you've ever questioned, yet you persist in harassing users with your dishonest interpretations of out-of-context screenshots. For example, did it not once occur to you that perhaps the Sfrohne screenshot was provided by an actual admin, and not a "secret" admin?

I am not setting you up to be banned, I am giving you an opportunity to avoid getting banned. Your repeated attacks on people simply for being in the Ruqqus Discord server are unacceptable, and you are dancing on the edge of the "no targeted harassment" rule. You should stop now before you fall off.

Translated (in paragraph order):

The cabal is not real. There is no cabal. There is no RCP. It's all in your imagination. Everything you see is fake. Any screenshots of the cabal are fake. Any evidence is fake. (gaslighting 101)

It is a thought crime to publish evidence that goes against our narrative. We will protect those we have selectively chosen from all arguments against them. Criticism is not allowed on our fake free-speech platform. All criticism is considered harassment and now a crime.

I am not setting you up to be banned, I am giving you an opportunity to avoid getting banned.

(can we all just admire what a golden statement that is coming from the retard admins)

Attacking people for being in the Ruqqus Discord is not allowed. Stop criticizing us at once or you will be promptly banned. Also, any evidence of discord screenshots is fake if it's presented by the other side criticizing the RCP. Everything you do is your fault and never our fault for the unequal enforcement of the Ruqqus ToS.

Not to mention they already exiled @CrystalVulpine from +Ruqqus for valid criticism.

post.body:
Translating Cap's responses to @CrystalVulpine

https://ruqqus.com/+uslashremoved/post/695h/sfrohne-permanently-banned-for-linking-to/lufl

>I'm going to have to ask you to stop harassing other users. Your zeal for freedom is admirable, but your conduct is crossing a line.

Translated: You are not allowed to criticize other users not being punished by us, despite the obvious double-standard. Those users have special privileges of admin protection which means their immune to all claims of unfair Terms of Service enforcement. Calling us out on our hypocrisy will result in a sitewide ban under the false reason of "harassment".


https://ruqqus.com/+uslashremoved/post/695h/sfrohne-permanently-banned-for-linking-to/luk2

>No, your crusade against users who are part of your fictional "cabal" is the problem. You have invented a conspiracy in your head, and are now lashing out at people for being part of that imagined conspiracy.

>I have reached out to you numerous times to explain everything you've ever questioned, yet you persist in harassing users with your dishonest interpretations of out-of-context screenshots. For example, did it not once occur to you that perhaps the Sfrohne screenshot was provided by an actual admin, and not a "secret" admin?

>I am not setting you up to be banned, I am giving you an opportunity to avoid getting banned. Your repeated attacks on people simply for being in the Ruqqus Discord server are unacceptable, and you are dancing on the edge of the "no targeted harassment" rule. You should stop now before you fall off.

Translated (in paragraph order):

The cabal is not real. There is no cabal. There is no RCP. It's all in your imagination. Everything you see is fake. Any screenshots of the cabal are fake. Any evidence is fake. (gaslighting 101)

It is a thought crime to publish evidence that goes against our narrative. We will protect those we have selectively chosen from all arguments against them. Criticism is not allowed on our fake free-speech platform. All criticism is considered harassment and now a crime.

>I am not setting you up to be banned, I am giving you an opportunity to avoid getting banned. 

(can we all just admire what a golden statement that is coming from the retard admins)

Attacking people for being in the Ruqqus Discord is not allowed. Stop criticizing us at once or you will be promptly banned. Also, any evidence of discord screenshots is fake if it's presented by the other side criticizing the RCP. Everything you do is your fault and never our fault for the unequal enforcement of the Ruqqus ToS.

Not to mention they already exiled @CrystalVulpine from +Ruqqus for valid criticism.

https://ruqqus.com/+general/post/69dy/captainmeta4-and-asinineporcupine-should-be-permabanned

https://ruqqus.com/+Ruqqus/mod/log/4o0

post.body:
Translating Cap's responses to @CrystalVulpine

https://ruqqus.com/+uslashremoved/post/695h/sfrohne-permanently-banned-for-linking-to/lufl

>I'm going to have to ask you to stop harassing other users. Your zeal for freedom is admirable, but your conduct is crossing a line.

Translated: You are not allowed to criticize other users not being punished by us, despite the obvious double-standard. Those users have special privileges of admin protection which means their immune to all claims of unfair Terms of Service enforcement. Calling us out on our hypocrisy will result in a sitewide ban under the false reason of "harassment".


https://ruqqus.com/+uslashremoved/post/695h/sfrohne-permanently-banned-for-linking-to/luk2

>No, your crusade against users who are part of your fictional "cabal" is the problem. You have invented a conspiracy in your head, and are now lashing out at people for being part of that imagined conspiracy.

>I have reached out to you numerous times to explain everything you've ever questioned, yet you persist in harassing users with your dishonest interpretations of out-of-context screenshots. For example, did it not once occur to you that perhaps the Sfrohne screenshot was provided by an actual admin, and not a "secret" admin?

>I am not setting you up to be banned, I am giving you an opportunity to avoid getting banned. Your repeated attacks on people simply for being in the Ruqqus Discord server are unacceptable, and you are dancing on the edge of the "no targeted harassment" rule. You should stop now before you fall off.

Translated (in paragraph order):

The cabal is not real. There is no cabal. There is no RCP. It's all in your imagination. Everything you see is fake. Any screenshots of the cabal are fake. Any evidence is fake. (gaslighting 101)

It is a thought crime to publish evidence that goes against our narrative. We will protect those we have selectively chosen from all arguments against them. Criticism is not allowed on our fake free-speech platform. All criticism is considered harassment and now a crime.

>I am not setting you up to be banned, I am giving you an opportunity to avoid getting banned. 

(can we all just admire what a golden statement that is coming from the retard admins)

Attacking people for being in the Ruqqus Discord is not allowed. Stop criticizing us at once or you will be promptly banned. Also, any evidence of discord screenshots is fake if it's presented by the other side criticizing the RCP. Everything you do is your fault and never our fault for the unequal enforcement of the Ruqqus ToS.

Not to mention they already exiled @CrystalVulpine from +Ruqqus for valid criticism.

https://ruqqus.com/+general/post/69dy/captainmeta4-and-asinineporcupine-should-be-permabanned

https://ruqqus.com/+Ruqqus/mod/log/4o0

https://ruqqus.com/+Ruqqus/mod/log/4nz
post.body_html:
Translating Cap's responses to @CrystalVulpine

https://ruqqus.com/+uslashremoved/post/695h/sfrohne-permanently-banned-for-linking-to/lufl

I'm going to have to ask you to stop harassing other users. Your zeal for freedom is admirable, but your conduct is crossing a line.

Translated: You are not allowed to criticize other users not being punished by us, despite the obvious double-standard. Those users have special privileges of admin protection which means their immune to all claims of unfair Terms of Service enforcement. Calling us out on our hypocrisy will result in a sitewide ban under the false reason of "harassment".

https://ruqqus.com/+uslashremoved/post/695h/sfrohne-permanently-banned-for-linking-to/luk2

No, your crusade against users who are part of your fictional "cabal" is the problem. You have invented a conspiracy in your head, and are now lashing out at people for being part of that imagined conspiracy.

I have reached out to you numerous times to explain everything you've ever questioned, yet you persist in harassing users with your dishonest interpretations of out-of-context screenshots. For example, did it not once occur to you that perhaps the Sfrohne screenshot was provided by an actual admin, and not a "secret" admin?

I am not setting you up to be banned, I am giving you an opportunity to avoid getting banned. Your repeated attacks on people simply for being in the Ruqqus Discord server are unacceptable, and you are dancing on the edge of the "no targeted harassment" rule. You should stop now before you fall off.

Translated (in paragraph order):

The cabal is not real. There is no cabal. There is no RCP. It's all in your imagination. Everything you see is fake. Any screenshots of the cabal are fake. Any evidence is fake. (gaslighting 101)

It is a thought crime to publish evidence that goes against our narrative. We will protect those we have selectively chosen from all arguments against them. Criticism is not allowed on our fake free-speech platform. All criticism is considered harassment and now a crime.

I am not setting you up to be banned, I am giving you an opportunity to avoid getting banned.

(can we all just admire what a golden statement that is coming from the retard admins)

Attacking people for being in the Ruqqus Discord is not allowed. Stop criticizing us at once or you will be promptly banned. Also, any evidence of discord screenshots is fake if it's presented by the other side criticizing the RCP. Everything you do is your fault and never our fault for the unequal enforcement of the Ruqqus ToS.

Not to mention they already exiled @CrystalVulpine from +Ruqqus for valid criticism.

body:
Previously the TOS didn't have rules against using alts to bypass guild limits

That didn't stop the admins from banning klenvastergan and then update the TOS the next day

parent.body:
Previously the TOS didn’t have rules against using alts to evade exiles or user blocks, might’ve been an oversight on the Admins part.

I don’t think he should he banned because this is ages ago and serves nothing. It only counts if there is a more recent case happening, which would be fair.

post.body:
Translating Cap's responses to @CrystalVulpine

https://ruqqus.com/+uslashremoved/post/695h/sfrohne-permanently-banned-for-linking-to/lufl

>I'm going to have to ask you to stop harassing other users. Your zeal for freedom is admirable, but your conduct is crossing a line.

Translated: You are not allowed to criticize other users not being punished by us, despite the obvious double-standard. Those users have special privileges of admin protection which means their immune to all claims of unfair Terms of Service enforcement. Calling us out on our hypocrisy will result in a sitewide ban under the false reason of "harassment".


https://ruqqus.com/+uslashremoved/post/695h/sfrohne-permanently-banned-for-linking-to/luk2

>No, your crusade against users who are part of your fictional "cabal" is the problem. You have invented a conspiracy in your head, and are now lashing out at people for being part of that imagined conspiracy.

>I have reached out to you numerous times to explain everything you've ever questioned, yet you persist in harassing users with your dishonest interpretations of out-of-context screenshots. For example, did it not once occur to you that perhaps the Sfrohne screenshot was provided by an actual admin, and not a "secret" admin?

>I am not setting you up to be banned, I am giving you an opportunity to avoid getting banned. Your repeated attacks on people simply for being in the Ruqqus Discord server are unacceptable, and you are dancing on the edge of the "no targeted harassment" rule. You should stop now before you fall off.

Translated (in paragraph order):

The cabal is not real. There is no cabal. There is no RCP. It's all in your imagination. Everything you see is fake. Any screenshots of the cabal are fake. Any evidence is fake. (gaslighting 101)

It is a thought crime to publish evidence that goes against our narrative. We will protect those we have selectively chosen from all arguments against them. Criticism is not allowed on our fake free-speech platform. All criticism is considered harassment and now a crime.

>I am not setting you up to be banned, I am giving you an opportunity to avoid getting banned. 

(can we all just admire what a golden statement that is coming from the retard admins)

Attacking people for being in the Ruqqus Discord is not allowed. Stop criticizing us at once or you will be promptly banned. Also, any evidence of discord screenshots is fake if it's presented by the other side criticizing the RCP. Everything you do is your fault and never our fault for the unequal enforcement of the Ruqqus ToS.

Not to mention they already exiled @CrystalVulpine from +Ruqqus for valid criticism.

https://ruqqus.com/+general/post/69dy/captainmeta4-and-asinineporcupine-should-be-permabanned

https://ruqqus.com/+Ruqqus/mod/log/4o0

https://ruqqus.com/+Ruqqus/mod/log/4nz

Translating Cap's responses to @CrystalVulpine

https://ruqqus.com/+uslashremoved/post/695h/sfrohne-permanently-banned-for-linking-to/lufl

I'm going to have to ask you to stop harassing other users. Your zeal for freedom is admirable, but your conduct is crossing a line.

Translated: You are not allowed to criticize other users not being punished by us, despite the obvious double-standard. Those users have special privileges of admin protection which means their immune to all claims of unfair Terms of Service enforcement. Calling us out on our hypocrisy will result in a sitewide ban under the false reason of "harassment".

https://ruqqus.com/+uslashremoved/post/695h/sfrohne-permanently-banned-for-linking-to/luk2

No, your crusade against users who are part of your fictional "cabal" is the problem. You have invented a conspiracy in your head, and are now lashing out at people for being part of that imagined conspiracy.

I have reached out to you numerous times to explain everything you've ever questioned, yet you persist in harassing users with your dishonest interpretations of out-of-context screenshots. For example, did it not once occur to you that perhaps the Sfrohne screenshot was provided by an actual admin, and not a "secret" admin?

I am not setting you up to be banned, I am giving you an opportunity to avoid getting banned. Your repeated attacks on people simply for being in the Ruqqus Discord server are unacceptable, and you are dancing on the edge of the "no targeted harassment" rule. You should stop now before you fall off.

Translated (in paragraph order):

The cabal is not real. There is no cabal. There is no RCP. It's all in your imagination. Everything you see is fake. Any screenshots of the cabal are fake. Any evidence is fake. (gaslighting 101)

It is a thought crime to publish evidence that goes against our narrative. We will protect those we have selectively chosen from all arguments against them. Criticism is not allowed on our fake free-speech platform. All criticism is considered harassment and now a crime.

I am not setting you up to be banned, I am giving you an opportunity to avoid getting banned.

(can we all just admire what a golden statement that is coming from the retard admins)

Attacking people for being in the Ruqqus Discord is not allowed. Stop criticizing us at once or you will be promptly banned. Also, any evidence of discord screenshots is fake if it's presented by the other side criticizing the RCP. Everything you do is your fault and never our fault for the unequal enforcement of the Ruqqus ToS.

Not to mention they already exiled @CrystalVulpine from +Ruqqus for valid criticism.
